edu.vt.middleware.password
Class AbstractDigestRule

java.lang.Object
  edu.vt.middleware.password.AbstractPasswordRule
      edu.vt.middleware.password.AbstractDigestRule
All Implemented Interfaces:
PasswordRule
Direct Known Subclasses:
PasswordHistoryRule, PasswordSourceRule
public abstract class AbstractDigestRule
extends AbstractPasswordRule

AbstractDigestRule provides core methods for password rules that use a digest.

Method Detail

useDigest

public void useDigest(java.lang.String algorithm,
                      edu.vt.middleware.crypt.util.Converter conv)
This will set the supplied digest algorithm to be used when password comparison are made. Useful if you need to compare password which are in a hashed form. See DigestAlgorithm.

Parameters:
algorithm - String to use for hashing
conv - Converter to convert bytes to string
